Title: Interventions for reducing medication errors in children in hospital
Abstract: This is the protocol for a review and there is no abstract. The objectives are as follows: To determine the effectiveness of interventions to reduce medication errors in children in hospital. Copyright © 2006 The Cochrane Collaboration. Published by John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
